channel.title: Ben's Nurture Africa Trip
channel.description: Recent content on Ben's Nurture Africa Trip

item.title: 10km for 10 Days: Day 1
item.description: Today(Actually yesterday at day of publication) marks day 1 of my first fundraising venture for my return to Uganda. I will be writing a blog like this everyday for the next 10 days and posting my journey while over in Uganda. The idea of this blog is not only to raise money for this trip but to drive traffic to this website so I can convince companies to sponsor tshirt/hoodie space AND so you can see the work Nurture Africa do in Nansana.
